attributes.action: Provide more support and help for those with mental health disorders.
attributes.additional_details:
The right help is often not given, and when it is the waiting list is so incredibly long you're holding on by a thread to stay well.

The statistics of mental health are consistently on the rise- and this is because we are being refused the help we need. 

I am asking for a change- these services should in no question be paid for by the sufferer. The help should also be regular and given as quickly as possible to reduce suicide statistics- another huge problem from being given inadequate help.
attributes.background:
There is not enough support out there for mental health. 
I myself was refused care in order to stop self harming- I was told that if I did want help I needed to pay for each session (around 50 pounds for an hour) and I was also told that I would have to drive an hour each time. 
This has to stop.
